intro: Aspidogyne robusta, commonly known as the robust aspidogyne, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Aspidogyne robusta is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and thickets. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and taxonomic studies.
